description:
Subaru visits a bookstore to buy a copy of a favorite book, but the employee at the register doesn`t trust his motives...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 13 - Shishi-ou no Mita Hon
Re:Petit - Re: Starting Life in Another World from Petit - Petit 13 - The Book the Lion King Saw
Re:ぷち Re:プチから始める異世界生活 ぷち13 獅子王のみた本
